channel.title: [562] Source+Client [562]
channel.description:
[center][b][u][562]Source+Client[/u][/b][/center] [center][b]Download: http://rapidshare.com/files/326277966/_562_Source_Client.rar.html[/b][/center] Ok, well i tried my best to fix this, and its actualy pretty good a couple bugs... heres a screenshot.
Fixes: Added Some Animations - Godswords Banking HD Working Better Some Stuff That Was Wrong With The Client
To Be Fixed: Walking Through Walls Teleports And More.
[IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k65/ryanrs2006/562Server.jpg[/img]
If Your A Good Scripter/Coder You Should Get This, Its Basicly A Clean Source+Client Not Worked On Yet Only A Couple Stuff.
The Best To Make A Server 562 Right Now Is A Pvp Server. The IP's Are Set At 127.0.0.1
Credits - SourceReleaser 1% Hotyute 99%
If It Doesnt Work, Please PM Me The Problem And I Will Try To Fix It.
[center][b]Download: http://rapidshare.com/files/326277966/_562_Source_Client.rar.html[/b][/center]

item.title: [562] Source+Client [562]
item.dc:creator: @str8golden str8golden
item.description:
@str8golden wrote:

[quote=“WAFFLE-, post:11, topic:321972”][quote author=chopstickz link=topic=418391.msg3075265#msg3075265 date=1261784460]

Can’t you get sued for 562’s…

You can be sued for any form of runescape private servers, If Jagex decideds to take legal action agaisnt you, But they are out numbered and tend to stay out of small time servers. Most of the time they leave us alone.
[/quote]That is true, but im pretty sure if the server has atleast more than 1k players they gonna sue lol

No you cannot… we arent up to date with the Copyright of jagex so aslong as we stay behind them mopar. R u n 3 s 3 r v 3 r, r locus wont get sued. jagex’s current deob 568[/quote]
-deletes fully coded 614 he was about to put up as a server - o.o…

Read full topic
